00020 #ifndef __HKIT_H
00021 #include "hdf.h"
00022 #include "hfile.h"
00023 
00024 /* tag_messages is the list of tag descriptions in the system, kept as
00025    tag-description pairs.  To look up a description, a linear search is
00026    required but efficiency should be okay. */
00027 typedef struct tag_descript_t
00028   {
00029       uint16      tag;          /* tag for description ? */
00030       const char *desc;         /* tag description ? */
00031       const char *name;         /* tag name ? */
00032   }
00033 tag_descript_t;
00034 
00035 /* stringizing macro */
00036 #define string(x) #x
00037 
00038 /*  NOTE:
00039  *        Please keep tag descriptions <= 30 characters - a
00040  *        lot of pretty-printing code depends on it.
00041  */
00042 PRIVATE const tag_descript_t tag_descriptions[] =
00043 {
00044 /* low-level set */
00045     {DFTAG_NULL, string(DFTAG_NULL), "No Data"},
00046     {DFTAG_LINKED, string(DFTAG_LINKED), "Linked Blocks Indicator"},

00121 /* nt_message is the list of NT descriptions in the system, kept as
00122    NT-description pairs.  To look up a description, a linear search is
00123    required but efficiency should be okay. */
00124 typedef struct nt_descript_t
00125   {
00126       int32       nt;           /* nt for description */
00127       const char *name;         /* nt name */
00128       const char *desc;         /* nt description */
00129   }
00130 nt_descript_t;
00131 
00132 PRIVATE const nt_descript_t nt_descriptions[] =
00133 {
00134 
00135 /* Masks for types */
00136     {DFNT_NATIVE, string(DFNT_NATIVE), "native format"},
00137     {DFNT_CUSTOM, string(DFNT_CUSTOM), "custom format"},
00138     {DFNT_LITEND, string(DFNT_LITEND), "little-endian format"},
00139 
00140     {DFNT_NONE, string(DFNT_NONE), "number-type not set"},
00141 
00142 /* Floating point types */
00143     {DFNT_FLOAT32, string(DFNT_FLOAT32), "32-bit floating point"},
00144     {DFNT_FLOAT64, string(DFNT_FLOAT64), "64-bit floating point"},
00145     {DFNT_FLOAT128, string(DFNT_FLOAT128), "128-bit floating point"},
00146 
00147 /* Integer types */
00148     {DFNT_INT8, string(DFNT_INT8), "8-bit signed integer"},
00149     {DFNT_UINT8, string(DFNT_UINT8), "8-bit unsigned integer"},
00150     {DFNT_INT16, string(DFNT_INT16), "16-bit signed integer"},
00151     {DFNT_UINT16, string(DFNT_UINT16), "16-bit unsigned integer"},
00152     {DFNT_INT32, string(DFNT_INT32), "32-bit signed integer"},
00153     {DFNT_UINT32, string(DFNT_UINT32), "32-bit unsigned integer"},
00154     {DFNT_INT64, string(DFNT_INT64), "64-bit signed integer"},
00155     {DFNT_UINT64, string(DFNT_UINT64), "64-bit unsigned integer"},
00156     {DFNT_INT128, string(DFNT_INT128), "128-bit signed integer"},
00157     {DFNT_UINT128, string(DFNT_UINT128), "128-bit unsigned integer"},
00158 
00159 /* Character types */
00160     {DFNT_CHAR8, string(DFNT_CHAR8), "8-bit signed char"},
00161     {DFNT_UCHAR8, string(DFNT_UCHAR8), "8-bit unsigned char"},
00162     {DFNT_CHAR16, string(DFNT_CHAR16), "16-bit signed char"},
00163     {DFNT_UCHAR16, string(DFNT_UCHAR16), "16-bit unsigned char"}
00164
